title: D/c before game got me low Q
body:
I was in the middle of starting a game, and right before it started i got disconnected. Logged back in and now I'm in low Q  with a 20 min wait time. Could someone fix this for me. I had no control of what happen and i wasn't trying to dodge.

P.s. I had another computer right beside me playing music off youtube; so i know it wasn't my internet.

replies.body: thanks for the help or rather, lack there of.

It sounds like you were gone for long enough to get marked by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Even if it's not intentional, the system treats everyone equally because all leaves causes others a negative experience.  Let me know if you're still having any issues and some more details, and I'd be happy to help troubleshoot!

It happened again, this time i got booted from a ranked match. was not able to reconnect after restarting client, lost the match, lost lp and on top of that I have to deal with stupid leavebuster. I need help with this cause not this is not fair.

That's ridiculous, I tried reconnecting as soon as it happen but the client wouldn't connect. And when I did I got some strange error. I understand your rules, but being punished over something you had no control over, on a client we  know is buggy as all get out. just forget it.
